All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    CopyJob
    Handles copying one set of files, e.g.
    CopyJob.OnceDone
    Callback invoked by CopyJob once all files have (finally) finished copying
    CopyOneFile
    Copies one file from an incoming DataInput to a dest filename in a local Directory
    CopyState
    Holds incRef'd file level details for one point-in-time segment infos on the primary node.
    FileMetaData
    Holds metadata details about a single file that we use to confirm two files (one remote, one local) are in fact "identical".
    HttpClientBase Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    HttpReplicator Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    IndexAndTaxonomyReplicationHandler Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    IndexAndTaxonomyRevision Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    IndexAndTaxonomyRevision.SnapshotDirectoryTaxonomyWriter
    A DirectoryTaxonomyWriter which sets the underlying IndexWriter's IndexDeletionPolicy to SnapshotDeletionPolicy.
    IndexInputInputStream Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    IndexReplicationHandler Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    IndexRevision Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    LocalReplicator Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    Node
    Common base class for PrimaryNode and ReplicaNode.
    NodeCommunicationException
    Should be thrown by subclasses of PrimaryNode and ReplicaNode if a non-fatal exception occurred while communicating between nodes.
    PerSessionDirectoryFactory Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    PrimaryNode
    Node that holds an IndexWriter, indexing documents into its local index.
    ReplicaNode
    Replica node, that pulls index changes from the primary node by copying newly flushed or merged index files.
    ReplicationClient Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    ReplicationClient.ReplicationHandler
    Handler for revisions obtained by the client.
    ReplicationClient.SourceDirectoryFactory
    Resolves a session and source into a Directory to use for copying the session files to.
    ReplicationService Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    ReplicationService.ReplicationAction
    Actions supported by the ReplicationService.
    Replicator Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    Revision Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    RevisionFile Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    SessionExpiredException Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
    SessionToken Deprecated.
    use org.apache.lucene.replicator.nrt instead
